name: Pinball Block Breaker Craft Free
description:
Create, edit and play your own pinball block breaker levels.

Pinball Block Breaker Craft is a mashup between pinball, breakout and crafting games. You create, edit and play your own levels. There are many different blocks to build your levels. Once you create a level you can play it to see if you can complete it.

+ Create Your Own Levels
+ Fun Mashup Between Pinball, Breakout and Crafting
+ Get 4 Stars By Completing A Level with 1 Ball
+ Many Different Building Blocks
+ Retro Styled Theme
+ Fun For Everyone
